modName: Sovereign's Slayer Armor for UNP by Yurica
summary: Add a set of female heavy armor called Sovereign Slayer and a matching Greataxe to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Yurica's Sovereign's Slayer Armor for UNP

[i]:: + :: News! :: + ::[/i]

- Your support is my enengy to keep going, positive or negative comments, please let me know ^_^
- Keep the screenshots coming, let me know how it looks on your Dragonborn!

[i]:: + :: Descriptions :: + ::[/i]

Hello all!

This mod adds a set of heavy armor called "Sovereign's Slayer" and a matching Greataxe to the game, the bodyshape is based on UNP but does not require any textures or meshes because the armor covers all the skin part.

The armor and the greataxe are equal to Daedric level, they can be crafted under the "Daedric" category. The armor set includes an invisible helm and Heavy Armor Matching Set perk is effective. The armor/weapon can be improved in the workbench/grindstone.

[i]:: + :: Requirements :: + ::[/i]

- Only requires HDT Heel System if you are using the HDT Version greaves.

[i]:: + :: Installations :: + ::[/i]

1 - Extract the files to a location.
2 - Place the extracted "meshes" and "textures" folders into your skyrim/data.
3 - If you use HDT Heel System please place "yurica_slayer.esp [HDT]" (included in the main file) into skyrim/data.
3 - If you do not use HDT Heel System please place "yurica_slayer.esp [NON-HDT]" (available in optional download) into skyrim/data.
4 - Activate only one of the esp you use.
5 - Enjoy and please don't forget to endorse if you like the armor, thank you! ^_^

[i]:: + :: Others :: + ::[/i]

There might be clipping in somewhere and in some special poses. [NON-HDT] version greaves clip into the ground, the armor is designed for HDT-Heels System. I might work into a non-heel version if I can think of it and have the time, thanks!

Please kindly contact me if you have any questions or needs permission, thank you very much.

[i]:: + :: Credits :: + ::[/i]

Thanks Bethesda for Skyrim.
Thanks dimon99 for UNP Body & HydrogensaysHDT for Heels System.
